history.action: Prefiled and under the rules provisionally referred to the Committee on Education.
Introduced in the Senate; read by title. Rules suspended. Read second time and referred to the Committee on Education.
Reported with amendments.
Read by title. Committee amendments read and adopted; ordered engrossed and recommitted to the Committee on Finance.
Reported with amendments.
Read by title; Committee amendments read and adopted. Ordered reengrossed and passed to third reading and final passage.
Senate floor amendments read and adopted. Read by title and passed by a vote of 36 yeas and 0 nays; ordered re-reengrossed and sent to the House. Motion to reconsider tabled.
Received in the House from the Senate, read by title, lies over under the rules.
Read by title, under the rules, referred to the Committee on Education.
Reported with amendments (12-0). Referred to the Legislative Bureau.
Reported without Legislative Bureau amendments.
Read by title, amended, passed to 3rd reading.
Scheduled for floor debate on 05/26/2021.
Rules suspended, called out of its regular order.
Read third time by title, amended, roll called on final passage, yeas 101, nays 0. Finally passed, ordered to the Senate.
Received from the House with amendments.
Amendments proposed by the House read and rejected by a vote of 36 yeas and 0 nays.
Notice of Senate rejecting House amendments.
House conferees appointed: Wright, Schexnayder, and Magee.
Senate conference committee members appointed: Cortez, Fields, and Barrow.
Notice House Conference Committee members appointed.
Notice of Senate conferees appointed.
Conference Committee report received. Lies over under the rules.
Conference committee report received.
Scheduled for floor debate on 06/09/2021.
Conference Committee Report read; adopted by a vote of 37 yeas and 0 nays.
Notice of Senate adoption of Conference Committee Report.
Rules suspended.
Conference Committee Report read, roll called, yeas 101, nays 0. The Conference Committee Report was adopted.
Notice House adopted the Conference Committee Report.
Enrolled. Signed by the President of the Senate.
Signed by the Speaker of the House.
Sent to the Governor by the Secretary of the Senate.
Signed by the Governor. Becomes Act No. 457.
Effective date 6/23/2021.
